title: What is the general term used for these pictured symbols?
content: I see these in VC++ compiled programs often. However, I've searched for several of them, such as AVCCHKBOX@@ and AVCDLC_NAME@@ to no avail. What are these called?

answers_data.content: These strings are part of the Run-Time Type Information (RTTI) produced by Visual C++ for polymorphic classes. This old article of mine describes some of it: http://www.openrce.org/articles/full_view/23

comments.text: Thanks. What happened to that site, btw??? A lot of these re sites just suddenly seemed to cease activity.
